data.description: A beautiful four-bedroom, full bath, single family home. Tons of original charm including some exposed beams, wainscotting, and gorgeous tin ceilings. Located in the town of Newbury, village of Wells River, VT. Walking distance to the health clinic, church, bank, restaurant, post office, and a local community park. With easy to maintain vinyl siding, standing seam roof, double pane windows, original wood floors, some fresh paint, a pellet stove, attached barn and detached garage/shop. Plenty of space for an affordable price! This home is move in ready. Don't wait, it won't last long!

Just a short distance from Mount Mansfield this brand-new well appointed, mountain modern home is located in the coveted Wildewood development of Stowe. Exceptional craftsmanship can be found throughout this four-bedroom home which features three floors of finished living space and includes a  first floor primary suite. It has everything you need for year-round living and a perfect layout for entertaining family and friends after a day at the mountain. Completed in 2021 with many of the upgrades this unit has a 2-car garage, covered porch, den and finished walk-out basement. Take advantage of several amenities the Wildewood community has to offer and experience the convenience of this ideal location with world class mountain biking, hiking and backcountry skiing right outside your door. Showings begin the afternoon of Friday 6/17.

Ledgewood slopeside end unit D2 on Okemo with garage D4! This is a spacious 3 bedroom, 3 bath townhome that is right on the Ledgewood Ski Trail. On the first floor are two bedrooms with a bath and laundry. The first bedroom has two sets of bunk beds and easy access to the hall bath. The second bedroom is en suite and designed so that it can be used as a separate rental unit. On the second floor, you will find an open concept design that includes a kitchen with a breakfast bar, a dining room, and access to a deck that overlooks the ski trail and warming hut.  Round out the space with a great wood-burning fireplace and skylights that create a mountain retreat feel. The third bedroom is two steps up from the living space and has its own full bath. This is one of the most sought-after locations at Ledgewood. Special Assessment is $ 643.22 quarterly.

Just in time for Fall ! Welcome to 13 Oglewood Road, pride of ownership can be found at every turn of this charming home, and is sure to attract all intending buyers. This spacious cape's 1st floor includes large kitchen / dining space, living room, bedroom and bathroom plus the bonus of a large 272SQFT fully insulated front porch. Upstairs you will find 2 good sized additional bedrooms with tons of storage, the long term home owner will see there is also potential space to add a 2nd bath in the future. The large dry basement includes a rec room with wood stove, laundry room, pantry and workshop / storage room with bulkhead. The savvy buyer will appreciate the big ticket items all being newer and in great shape including the roof, windows, heating system, & low maintenance vinyl siding. Outside relax with family and friends on a private & landscaped wooded lot, features include large paved driveway for visitor parking, over sized 1 car garage plus a 2nd open carport for gardening toys. The location itself is hard to beat, tucked away in quiet neighborhood yet less than 10 minutes to the I89 for easy access to Burlington and St Albans.

Unique opportunity with this charming Farmhouse offering an Accessory Apartment plus a barn/garage all on 1 private acre in Williston! The flexible floor plan allows for single-family use OR divide the home up easily for tenants, in-laws, a live-in nanny/au-pair or guests. The possibilities are endless both inside and out. In the backyard to find a shady deck and screened gazebo - perfect for relaxing in the summer time. Take the stone path to the garden and firepit area with tons of sunny lawn to expand the existing vegetable gardens. The fully fenced backyard is perfect for pets and offers plenty of privacy. Back inside, the main home features a spacious eat-in kitchen with ample storage, convenient 1st floor laundry and full bath, a woodstove in the living room to keep you warm in the winter plus an efficient mini-split that heats and cools. You'll find 4 bedrooms and a 3/4 bath upstairs plus a large rec room. The apartment also includes a large kitchen plus separate utilities, laundry, and basements for each unit. Beautiful gardens and perennial trees adorn the front yard. Convenient location just minutes to hiking trails, I-89 and Taft’s Corners.

Looking for new construction with the charm of an older home? This residence was a complete new build in 2018, in place of the original home that stood in the same spot! Located in one of the most sought after locations in Cornwall, this handsome cape style home is ready for you to move right in! A mudroom entry features a solid wood bench, & shelving/closet storage. Beautiful pine floors are throughout the home, with radiant floor heat on the main level. The kitchen has custom cherry cabinetry, stainless appliances, walk in pantry, and a center island for additional seating. Exposed beams start in the kitchen and continue into the dining room to add to the charm! The spacious living room, like the rest of the house, is filled with natural light! The screened in porch is on the south side of the home- the perfect place for warm evenings. Upstairs is the primary bedroom suite, with custom tile shower and double vanity. Two additional bedrooms with a full bath, and plenty of closet space!The full, dry basement could become additional living space, or is excellent storage!All new systems include an air exchanger, water softening system and propane boiler. The low maintenance exterior features fiber cement siding and a standing seam metal roof! The detached garage is currently set up for one car with additional bay for storage or workshop. The yard is nicely landscaped, with a stone retaining wall in front that sets the stage. Just three miles from Middlebury College, this is it!

Private mountain get-a-way with 2.80 acres to call your own!  2/3 bedrooms, newer roof, foundation poured in 2004.  Add your own touches and enjoy the proximity to skiiing, hiking, snow shoeing, swimming, boating and so many things that New England can offer.  The beauty of the Green Mountains at any time of the year can take your breath away.Please visit: https://www.alpenwaldvillage.com/  for information regarding the Association.The source of all representations are from the seller or a public source; broker has not verified same. It is recommended that buyer independently verify all information.

Open House on Friday 8/19/2022 from 3 - 6pm!  There will be refreshments! Great oppurtunity to own a home built in 1885. All the remodeling has been completed, and it's ready for you move in and enjoy! The property is located on Caernarvon Street in the town of Fair Haven.  The home has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths.  The home features 10.5 foot cielings and wonderful wood flooring!  The first floor is very open and ideal to host family and friends. For those of you that enjoy cooking, the kitchen is large and features huge windows allowing plenty of natural light in.  The outside of the home is easy to maintain.  The home is on .10 acres +/- and features a large deck in the back of the home.  The Garage is built to the eara of the home and is a must see as well.

Location, Location, Location! This beautiful property is located in the quaint Little City for the convenience of in-town living but with a feel of the country! This one level home sits on 2.18 acres of land and is set apart from the neighbors as it enjoys a sweeping drive taking you into a setting all your own. The home is situated on the land giving a view that focuses on nature, not your neighbors. You will love the gleaming hardwood floor throughout the open concept living space. You will easily enter the home from your attached 2-car garage into a mud/laundry room where all your day's baggage can be left before moving into the kitchen with a center island and plenty of storage. The kitchen sits off the Dining Rm which features a warming corner gas fireplace that can be seen and enjoyed from both the kitchen and the living room that extends to the front of the home. The primary bedroom suite boasts a private bath and large walk-in closet. Two guest rooms and main bath finish off the private area of the home. There is a full basement with a separate entrance that at the present time, houses a lettering & sign business, that is also for sale.  If this isn't enough for you, then you are the buyer looking for an extra garage/shop for those big person toys, and that car you have wanted to restore. Yes, there is a car lift and extra high overhead garage doors for ease of tinkering and fixing that classic baby! This is much more than a place to lay your head at night!

Charming Vt Log Home  Walk into true VT living! You feel the charm as you walk up and enter this one bedroom, 1 bath home offering a large open eat in kitchen with its butcher block countertops, sits along side of a calming stream that connects to the Gihon River. This quant authentic log home is ready to welcome your touch. Do you enjoy walking your dog or Ride your bicycle through the trails on this 3 plus acres awaits!!! A great home, Don't let this pass you bye. Move in ready!!

Charming 1920's New Englander on a large City lot with detached one car garage.  The home offers four bedrooms and one bath, large kitchen and living room with fireplace.  Close to all City amenities to include public transportation, schools, parks and Rutland Regional Medical Center.

Dreaming of home ownership?! Dream no more - you can own this nice Bungalow home located on a quiet residential street in Rutland City for likely less than you're paying in rent. Imagine having the space to garden, play with pets or spend your weekends entertaining friends on your own beautiful covered back deck!  This home features wood floors, open and airy single level living with lots of natural light, solid wood doors and more.  Meticulously maintained home that's been cherished by the current owners for more than 30 years.  Updates and improvements through the years, many within the last 5 years include: vinyl replacement windows, Buderus boiler, oil tank, hot water heater, roof, heat pump, sheet rock and the whole home was rewired.   There's a full walk-up attic for storage.  Walk-out basement has usable workshop space, laundry and more storage options.  An amazing twenty-foot covered deck spans the back of the home with beautiful tongue and groove wood ceiling, dining and comfortable outdoor living space.   On the exterior you'll find a detached outbuilding, lots of perennial flowers, raised beds for vegetables, compost bin, decorative fencing, green house, stone walkway and fantastic covered front porch.   Located within walking distance to parks/playgrounds, schools and is in nice established neighborhood.

Very well maintained 2 family home located on a pretty landscaped lot near downtown Rutland.  Some of the qualities include replacement windows, hardwood floors, updated bathroom in the downstairs, recently sheetrocked 3 season porch upstairs, partially finished attic, french doors and an oversized 2 car garage. Yearly Income is $28,800.00 and expenses estimated to be $7,496.00.

Very desirable Location.   one mile north or rte 102 and ct river. 5 room, 2 big bedrooms with big closets. 1 bath ranch with 1056 feet of living space. Basement is walk out and can be finished for more room.(high ceilings and dry. There is also a roomy attic. 2 car attached garage(a must in winter). All located on a 0.48 partially wooded lot. Large enclosed porch, open concept kitchen/dining and living room area. New metal roof, remodeled bathroom and kitchen,  upgraded baseboard heat. and T111 siding exterior for minimal maintenance.  Surrounded by 1400 acres of woods! 10 min from Lancaster NH. and 30 min to Burke Mnt

This property offers a little bit of everything for a multitude of buyers! A solid ranch style home on over 2 usable acres with an oversized 36'x35'- 3 bay detached garage with second story storage, attached single car garage with overhead storage, 2 stall horse barn with hay loft and plenty of parking area for a horse trailer or commercial sized truck! There is even an area with an old chicken coop! Pasture area behind the barn has board fencing with metal gates. The home boasts a huge family room that features a wood burning fireplace as the focal point. This room leads to the 3 season sun room as well as to the back deck overlooking the yard and pasture area. Though the house is stuck in the 60s, the space is there to add a primary bath onto the main bedroom, open the kitchen to the dining to make this your dream home. You will have country living without being in the country as you are right around the corner from Colchester Village. This is a real diamond in the rough!

Lovely 3-bedroom cape style home tucked away in a great South Burlington neighborhood! Come inside to find the large living room just to your left. This bright and open space features a wood-burning fireplace surrounded by barnwood wood trim and built-in shelving to one side, a unique focal point with added storage for your belongings. Just off of the living room is a fantastic screened-in porch where you can spend time with friends and family or just relax and enjoy the summer breeze. The formal dining room has plenty of light and space for your table and hutch, while the adjoining eat-in kitchen has enough space for a small dining table and a good amount of countertop & prep space. There’s a full bathroom and a large bedroom on the main level of this home, perfect for guests or a private owner’s retreat. There’s also an office/den on this level, a space that you can make your own! Upstairs, you’ll find a full bathroom and 2 bedrooms. The finished lower level has tons of extra space for multi-use and a wet bar area that’s great for entertaining. Wonderful, convenient location just off of Route 7 in South Burlington. Close to schools, shopping, dining, I-89 and more!

Classic 1920's Damsel looking for her Knight In Shining Armor!!  The home offers on the first floor - laundry area, full bath, kitchen, dining, living room and one bedroom.  Second floor offers two bedrooms and attic area.  She still has her original hardwood floors and woodwork.  Nice front porch to sit a spell!!  All on a City double lot!

Great country setting w/ lots of space, great views, nice meadows & privacy all on 4.5 +/- Acres. features 4 brs w/ possibility of another on 1st floor,l arge family room w/ woodstove, formal dining room, sunroom, office, 2 full baths and a large loft on third floor w/ skylights & a shed. Minutes to all 3 lakes Bomossen, Lake St. Catharine and lake Champlain close to ski areas and shopping.

PLEASE NOTE: When investing in this property with preREO, you are purchasing the non-performing first mortgage secured by the property. By completing the foreclosure, the buyer may become the owner of the property. Interior Access, as with any other type of note purchase, is typically NOT AVAILABLE. DISCLAIMER: The content provided herein is for informational purposes and no representation or warranty is made regarding its accuracy or completeness. Property descriptions, documents, and pictures may not accurately describe or depict the property. You are encouraged to conduct your own due diligence and seek independent professional advice if necessary.

Email - Fern_5@hotmail.com if interested.
2% commission to buyers agent - DO NOT CALL/EMAIL TO OFFER SERVICES

3 bedroom home on 2 acres with a detached shop/garage is located centrally to Waterbury Village, Stowe, Interstate 89 and all sorts of recreational activities. On a paved road just up the hill from the village with glimpses of Mt Mansfield through the trees in the back yard.  This antique cape is ready to make a home. Many components important to a home have been updated or replaced over time including a poured concrete foundation, new electric, new hot air furnace, septic system and a drilled well.  The quiet location just can't be beat!!  Large walk in closet for the master and additional large closets/storage for the other bedrooms.  Willing to sell mostly furnished if interested.

This turn key home sets perfectly on a gorgeous country setting just off of a paved road and only 10 minutes to Brattleboro! Enjoy the changing foliage while looking over your expansive lawn with perennials and a view of the pond and nearby hillside.  Filled with light, the home has three levels of nicely finished space, a cozy living space complete with a wood stove to keep you warm on winter days. Vaulted ceilings and exposed beams make this home feel spacious and open. Three bedrooms, three baths and a completely finished basement including private rooms for guests make this an easy choice! This house is equipped with a generator which comes in handy! Great storage above the garage and ample parking. Come home to serenity! Delayed showings to start 10/8. Open house 10/8 and 10/9 from 1-3. Seller reserves the right to accept an offer at any time.
location location location

Come make this 5 bedroom Winhall Hollow Road your new home or your home away from home.  Set back from the road this beautiful 4000 sq ft home has enough room for a growing family or a gathered family for skiing adventures.  Just minutes from Stratton Mountain and down the street from public access to Gale Meadow Pond, there are year round adventures ready to be explored from this well maintained home on 6 acres.  The Pond is only a short stroll through the woods, along a beautiful mountain stream.  Come park your car in the heated two car garage, kick off your ski gear and sit by the cozy fireplace.  There's so much that this property and location have to offer, just in time for the winter season.

167 Oberdorf and 142 Oberdorf - joined lots.  167 has an approved septic design, VT stamped worth about $4000.  142 also has  road frontage but is mostly ledge.  Purchased from town to add view potential to 167.

Grandview condo for sale with a great location near the Vermont National Country Club, Dorset Park, Wheeler Nature Park, South Burlington High School, shopping, I89, Downton Burlington, and more! There is a large storage closet at the front entrance and a coat closet. Large living room with wood laminate flooring. First-floor laundry off the living room and space under the staircase for storage. Dining area on the back side of the condo with a kitchen off to the right with plenty of cabinet space. Upstairs, there are two bedrooms and a full bathroom. There is a deck off the dining area for summer entertainment. one assigned parking spot and extra spaces in the parking lot for parking. The association allows for one pet. The condo can be rented.

Move-in ready 3 bedroom, 3 bath home on 5 aces in desirable Weybridge! When you drive up to this home you will see a beautiful level lot with mowed paths and a circular driveway. Inside is an open living/dining/kitchen with plenty of space for entertaining. The 1/2 bath and laundry are just off the kitchen and a separate family room (or formal dining room) completes the first floor. Upstairs you will find beautiful hardwood floors! The primary suite has a large walk in closet and a large bathroom with separate tub and shower. There are two more bedrooms upstairs, another full bath and a small bonus room that could be an office, library, playroom, etc... Full unfinished basement perfect for storage. As a bonus this property has river frontage across Quaker Village Rd.

This south facing parcel is conveniently located with easy access on a paved road!  This lot is located only 3/10 of a mile from the Kirby Country Club! Build your new home or business on this beautiful lot in a school choice town (pending local/state permitting). High school choice includes (but not limited to) St Johnsbury Academy and Lyndon Institute!  Owned by the same family for over 40 years. There is a power pole on the upper end of the driveway. Road frontage on Route 2 and a private drive/deeded ROW along the eastern boundary that is already in place.  Approximately 2-3 acres are wooded and the remainder is a field.  Nice mountain and local views from this property.  A great location close to St Johnsbury, Lyndonville, Waterford and Concord. Soil testing has not been completed but surrounding properties have conventional systems. Come see!

Filled with character and charm, this mountain home is an affordable getaway to be enjoyed with activities in all four seasons. Located at Hawk Resort in Plymouth, VT, centrally located between Okemo Mountain Resort and Killington Resort. This property has lake rights and dock access on Lake Amherst for your enjoyment, as well as being minutes from hiking, boating, shopping and restaurants and Plymouth State Park. With three levels of living space, 3 bedrooms and 2 baths, the floor plan is suited for family fun and privacy. There is a beautiful wood burning fireplace in the living room, which opens to the kitchen with updated, attractive, tiling, well lit dining room and mud entry. Lower level holds the bedrooms, den, baths and laundry. The exterior deck has a hot tub for more fun overlooking a wooded setting on 2.33 acres (2 lots). You won't want to miss this special opportunity to own a pristine home in Vermont!

Totally renovated a year ago, this light-filled townhouse is a gem. With beautiful new flooring, paint & trim, a remodeled 1/2 bath, new quartz counter tops in the kitchen, stainless steel appliances, and tile backsplash. The open dining/living area is spacious and light-filled. New light fixtures, recessed lighting, and flooring complete the dining/living area. Upstairs, the full bathroom has been completely upgraded with double vanity and quartz countertops, tile floors, and tile shower/tub surround. There are two large bedrooms and a bonus space that could make a great home office. Also included is a brand new NTI gas heating system and on demand water heater, as well as electrical upgrades. This is a wonderful investment!

Waterfront Lake Champlain year-round, 4-bedroom 2 bathroom all upgrades are done.  Sellers relocating in Spring to MD/VA. **NEW INTERIOR PHOTOS ADDED** Call Justin for more details and to discuss price/arrange for a showing.  646-260-7183.  We are listing privately and do not need a listing agent or representative.  Buyer Agents present offers and we can negotiate a commission.

$10,000 Price Reduction!!  Location!!  Just steps away from lake access and ready for immediate occupancy just in time for summer!  This one owner lake home has everything for year-round enjoyment.  Your own private dock space, beach access and a huge community lawn space for games!  This Modular was built in 2009 offering a one level open floor plan featuring open kitchen with center island & dining area with sliders to front deck.  Large living room with sliders for maximum daylight.  The Primary bedroom offers a full bath and walk-in closet.  Located right next door is a sweet bedroom, full bath and laundry area.  Don't miss seeing the Upstairs providing a huge bonus space!- The unfinished attic space is ready for you to finish to your liking.  The seller had it plumbed for a third bathroom and possible additional bedrooms (must check with zoning), a double office space or a gym.  Enjoy sunsets from the deck while entertaining after hitting the beach or boating for the day on hot summer days or ice fishing and snowmobiling in the winter for year-round fun.  Hand made firepit is great to sit around to relax and roast marshmallows.  Just minutes to Castleton Village and the University, a lake side dining restaurant, major ski areas and Route 4 Highway.  Get your offer in now to be able to enjoy the most of the wonderful summer heat.

Located in the Smokerise community of quality homes, this property sits on the cul-de-sac of a private road. With 3.93+/- acres and easy access to the VAST Trail, this home will fit many of your needs. It has three finished levels of living, with a primary bedroom on the main floor, open kitchen, living, and dining area with access to the deck for outdoor dining. The upper level has two additional bedrooms and a bath. The finished full basement has a large den/entertainment room, bonus room and full bath. This home has remodeled baths, stone fireplace, air lock entry, lots of sunlight, hot tub and two-car detached garage for the cars and snowmobiles. Another great feature of this home is that, after skiing, you won't get stuck in traffic as you will stay on the mountain roads to drive three minutes to your ski home getaway.

IMMACULATE 3 BEDROOM 1 1/2 BATH HOME IN MOVE IN CONDITION LOCATED ABOVE WAITSFIELD VILLAGE IN A FABULOUS EAST WAITSFIELD LOCATION. INSIDE YOU WILL FIND A DESIRABLE OPEN LAYOUT WITH WOOD FLOORS, MUDROOM, PANTRY, NEWER APPLIANCES AND NEW PROPANE HOT WATER HEATER. OUTSIDE YOU WILL FIND WELL KEPT GROUNDS WITH FLOWER GARDENS AND PLANTINGS, A STONE PATIO, A LARGE DECK WITH SOUTHWEST EXPOSURE AND THE WHOLE BACKYARD BEING FENCED IN TO ALLOW YOU TO LET PETS OUT AT WILL AND KEEP THEM CLOSE BY. ADD TO THIS A LARGE ATTACHED 2 CAR GARAGE WITH BUILT INS TO HELP STORE ALL OF YOUR STUFF, GREAT SOUTHWESTERN EXPOSURE AND SKI AREA VIEW POTENTIAL WITH SOME CLEARING AND YOU HAVE YOURSELF PROPERTY TO EXPLORE. SHOWINGS TO BEGIN ON 9/6/2022.

Sustainable self-sufficient paradise on 26 acres with 360 degree views of Vermont and New Hampshire mountains. Seller has not had an electric bill in 19 years, 100% solar powered, energy efficient home; R38 walls, R42 roof. This 1744 sf + full basement post & beam home features a large fieldstone fireplace in living/dining room with great ambiance. Jacuzzi tub and outdoor shower. Permaculture at its finest with apples, kiwis, plums, asparagus, hazelnuts, blueberries, raspberries and the list goes on. This off-grid home is built for energy efficiency, equipped with the latest technology. Drilled well with excellent water and also a dug well on the property. Additional 24x30 structure with large workshop with apartment upstairs. All windows are triple pane, standing seam roof, covered porches, upstairs balcony via a catwalk. Spectacular sunsets & stargazing. Stone walls, gardens galore, trail systems for XC skiing and recreation on the land. Want to know more? We will be happy to show it to you. Qualified buyers only. 30 min. to Dartmouth Medical Center or college. Ask your agent for video tour links!

Simply amazing!  Abutting over 500 acres of State land, this 87+ acre property includes a 3 bedroom, 2 bath custom log home and detached 4-bay, two story garage. What strikes you entering the property is the park-like setting. So much thought has gone into the construction of this home. All of the logs were hand-peeled for a lighter and brighter interior. Structurally...no skimping - 50-year roofing on both the house and barn, and if you are a connoisseur of Log Homes, you will note immediately the extra care that was taken in the biscuit-jointed and scribed trim work to give that extra finish detail - Wired for a generator - cathedral ceiling living/dining area with stone hearth and woodstove.  The Custom lighting throughout enhances a Vermont ambiance. The covered porch and open deck provides outdoor gathering spaces. The full walkout basement is plumbed for a bathroom and would make an ideal guest or in-law suite. The barn is to die for! Beautiful stonework and fortified construction combine to make a 4-bay, versatile barn-style garage with a ready-to-finish second floor with cupola. The surrounding grounds are delightful. Walking/ATV trails loop around the land and include a private, Spring-fed, 15' deep pond, open meadow and large forested area which is enrolled in the Current Use Program. The long-range views look to the South & West. Less than 15 minutes to Okemo and the lakes region. Snowmobile on your own property or VAST is nearby. 2022-09-12

Nestled in the hills of Bridgewater Corners, a well-appointed (3) Bedroom / (2) Bath home is near all the Upper Valley hot spots, and some of the best Vermont has to offer! This is a skier’s paradise property; without the extra HOA fees and private road maintenance costs! Live between 2 world-class ski resorts at your doorstep! Just 6 minutes to Killington’s Base Lodge Skyship Gondola, and only 20 minutes to Okemo Mountain. Bring All Your Toys! This home has an abundance of flat lawn space to enjoy, a detached garage, basement, and sits on a 11.3-acre wooded lot overlooking the mountains. Built in 1892, this charming New England farmhouse has hardwood floors and is a spacious 2,262sf of finished livable area, with an additional unfinished 1,216sf basement. Constructed with quality materials, this home has been well-maintained for residents’ maximum comfort and enjoyment during all-seasons.  Along with being perfect for a primary residence, this home and location are a great choice for a getaway retreat property without excessive year-round upkeep / maintenance.  Investors will also find this a perfect candidate for an AIRBNB rental property. The 2nd floor has a kitchen already in-place, and is currently used as an in-law guest suite which can be accessed by a separate entrance. The garage could also be an ideal conversion to an extra unit. Frequent the restaurants and nightlife of both Killington & Woodstock. Amazing Fall foliage! Please view the 3D tour attached.

Located on a historic and picturesque road in Charlotte, this beautiful custom-built timber frame home offers quality craftsmanship and stylish details throughout! The moment you arrive inside, you will appreciate the open, well-designed floor plan and will be immediately drawn to a myriad of natural woods and soaring ceilings. West-facing views of the 4.08-acre lot and pond, including seasonal views of the Adirondack mountains, are enjoyed from the wall of windows in the living room, the 3-season porch, and the expansive outdoor deck. The large wooden island in the gorgeous kitchen was built by the owner and is stunning. The main level also features a spacious flex room (perfect for a den, office, or guest space), an adjacent stylish 3/4 bathroom, and a large mudroom that has a 1/2 bathroom and laundry area. The upper level boasts a generous primary bedroom suite with a gorgeous en-suite bathroom. A second bedroom with a cool loft space and a full bath complete this floor. The finished walk-out lower level offers a relaxing recreation room, additional bedrooms or offices, and a large storage room. The detached 36’ x 24’ garage/barn, with walk-up storage above, provides for a multitude of uses. Situated in the countryside of Charlotte, this lovely home with tasteful design and decor provides a rural lifestyle yet is still close to Charlotte and Shelburne villages and the town beach. Burlington and Middlebury are only 25 minutes away.

You will love living in the village in this brilliantly restored Victorian. The convenience of being able to walk to everything coupled with good conversation w. the neighbors that live in this community is something that will be cherished for years. Move right in and start to enjoy. You won't spend a lot of time taking care of the lawn, which is filtered with many floral delights and has rear stairs that will lead your children to numerous acres behind the elementary school. Basket ball and tennis courts are pretty much in your back yard, coupled with various baseball fields and new play ground equipment for the smaller ones in the family. When you enter the front door a beautifully appointed living room w. window alcove area, wood flrs, and a marbelized slate facade accent the room. To the left of this room you enter an incredible family room w. built ins. The right side of the living room you will find a perfect den/office, or play room. The formal dining room is perfect for family gatherings and leads you into the eat in new custom kitchen w. central island, quartz counters & beautiful fixtures. The balance of the first floor has a half bath and laundry room. The upstairs has 3 spacious bdrms, a full bath, and custom 3/4 bath w. radiant heat in the floor. Updated electrical, plumbing and a solid basement complete the home. The 3 story garage/barn has an incredible workshop that offers an abundance of storage. Time to call this one home for your family.

Owner has lovingly cared for every aspect of this property for the past 19 years, and is ready to pass the torch to the next owner.  This history-filled gem offers a rare mix of in-town convenience and a gardener’s private oasis; PLUS nearly 100 ft of easily accessible, privately owned, water frontage on the gorgeous Whetstone Brook.  There is a formal entry foyer off the cozy, covered porch facing west, and a utilitarian portico entry into a renovated mudroom off the north side of the house.  A spacious full bath on main level was renovated by owner; now gleams w/ subway tiled walls, hexagon ceramic tile flooring, and a glass block window.  Comfortably-sized living, dining & kitchen rooms complete the main floor.  Three BR’s on the 2nd floor.  Numerous other up-dates:  Andersen windows and trim, kitchen floor, paint, siding, AND EXTENSIVE exterior landscaping – retaining wall, privacy fence, wrought iron entrance gate, and an abundance of gardens.  Spacious outbuilding w/ power, currently used as workshop.  Attached shed currently used for wood pellet storage.  The off-street parking area is illuminated with a touch of class.  Extensive gardens adorn the property; some mature and others planted annually with herbs, vegetables and fruit.  Plenty of room for backyard fun with friends.  Enjoy the evenings throughout all the seasons around the firepit!  Don’t let this in-town gem slip away.  Schedule your viewing now.  Delayed showings begin July 30, 2022.

Hillside retreat situated on 8+ private acres just minutes to the interstate and local amenities! Enjoy the tranquility of this location surrounded by rolling hills and woodlands. The contemporary style home boasts features like wide board pine flooring, exposed beams and vaulted ceilings while two VT Castings wood stoves provide cozy supplemental heat during the winter months. The exterior features a solid standing seam roof and a spacious back deck overlooking a babbling brook below and is perfect for relaxing on a summer evening while the property also has multiple sheds/outbuildings including a barn that could be used for horses or livestock. Come take advantage of this unique opportunity to bring your personal touches and a bit of TLC to create your dream property today!

Magnificent "Bear Hug Den" is the ultimate private escape. First time offered on market. Fontaine Hill Rd is located in the quiet side of Morristown and receives almost zero ambient traffic. It is here that you will find this beautiful, meticulously maintained home offering privacy, functionality and convenience, whether making it a home of your own or an income generating vacation rental. Experience stunning views of the Worcester range and the vibrant green fields from many of your living spaces, both indoor and outdoor. Watch the sun come up from the comfort of your bed or stargaze from your private deck. While the property spans about 2.6 acres, including a 3 bedroom / 2 bath home that’s approximately 1,650 square feet, it lives well beyond its borders. Natural treasures surround the place, and the number of fresh-air activities seem boundless—from mountain biking and hiking to gardening, wildlife watching, or gazing at the stars under a sky devoid of artificial light. Amenities are right around the corner, the shops and restaurants of Morristown and Stowe are all within a few miles drive, and an array of world class skiing is easily accessible. This is a must see Vermont lifestyle property.

This distinctive Craftsman Style home is located in a quiet, upscale neighborhood just steps from the extensive Retreat Trails network.  The house features refinished oak and Douglas fir floors and period built-ins throughout.  The sun-drenched living room has a wood-burning fireplace with an energy efficient infrared fireplace insert.  The sun room ell accommodates a formal dining table for six.  The kitchen has granite tiled counters, pendant lighting, slide in range, built-in glass front china cupboard and original 1920’s dining nook.  The house was designed and built by two brothers who shared it as an extended family home with an in-law suite.  The layout is conducive to being used as a spacious, single family home.  The second floor in-law suite would make a wonderful master bedroom suite by converting the modest second kitchen into a huge master bath.  The two existing full baths feature classic white and midnight blue ceramic tile, pedestal sinks and deep, porcelain soaking tubs with showers.  The attic is a fabulous space just begging to be finished into living space.  The house is situated high up on the hill offering short range views to the south.  The private, level yard features an old stone fountain (not functional), stone fireplace, a sunken garden and extensive shade gardens.  Owner is Licensed Real Estate Broker.

This classic dormered cape with attached 2 car garage sits on 1.1 acres and abuts conserved land with woodland trails on hundreds of acres of protected land to explore out the back door.  The house features a main floor bedroom and two large upstairs bedrooms with plenty of closet and storage space, two full baths (one per floor), a first-floor office/den, living/dining area with a wood burning fireplace (insert), hardwood floors throughout the main living area, a private back deck and a full walk-out basement that could easily be finished into additional living space. On the outside you'll find a side yard firepit, ample room for a garden, a level front yard and the paved driveway.  HILLWINDS is one of the more sought-after locations in the area in which to live mainly due to its unique combination of close proximity to downtown (5 min), exposure and elevation and the sense of rural country living, and peaceful quiet living normally found much further from town. Perhaps the greatest attribute is the hundreds of acres of conserved land that abuts the parcel.  Not only is there direct access to the trail that winds through the large protected common land tract out back but the property also enjoys the view across the street of the 30 plus acre agricultural field owned by the Retreat Farm and other conserved land creating a situation that cannot change with the times.  This is truly a special spot to call home.

This spectacular lot has tremendous opportunity for multiple uses including forestry, maple sugaring,  residential, or recreational property. Whether you wish to preserve or develop this site you won't lack space and options on this ideally situated lot along a quiet country road set between the quaint towns of Grafton and Townshend Vermont. With several trails that criss-cross this beautiful 123.5-acre parcel you will find many areas to explore and just hang out and enjoy nature including several fruit trees and bushes dotted around the landscape. This mixed forest land has several elevated areas to capture the views and stunning sunsets. The meticulously crafted cabin was added circa 2005 and is a warm and welcome retreat after a short hike into the woods.  There are several vernal streams and waterfalls to discover and a quiet seasonal pond not far from the cabin retreat. The property would also make a wonderful family estate. With 3 driveways all leading to separate open areas where additional cabins could easily be added. Also, with easy access to the local mountains, surrounding VAST trails and all that Vermont has to offer this fantastic site won't disappoint. Come take a hike and see!!
